short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: offline based ASCIIart,convert your picture to ASCII text art

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ASCIIart is offline based application.. ,it's converts your picture to ASCII text art.
ASCII art is any sort of pictures or diagrams drawn with the printable characters in the ASCII character set.in this program you can customize ASCII format ,fonts ,font colours ,background colour letter-spacing,you can also create your own ASCII format it's fully written in JavaScript (jquery),HTML5,css ,it's dynamically display all your  customization,,ohhh..it's very cool app i hope you can happy by doing ASCII .
;)Happy asciing.:).ASCII art is fun:)

Note : This app needs 1366x768 Resolution screen or higher ,Image Must be 500 Pixels or greater to Get The Best Results.
